scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run bundle
scripts.build: babel zero.js index.js -d dist/es5 && babel subproviders -d dist/es5/subproviders && babel util -d dist/es5/util
scripts.bundle: mkdir -p ./dist && npm run bundle-engine && npm run bundle-zero
scripts.bundle-zero: browserify -s ZeroClientProvider -e zero.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] > dist/ZeroClientProvider.js
scripts.bundle-engine: browserify -s ProviderEngine -e index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] > dist/ProviderEngine.js
